00125 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00126 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateModel() const
00127 {
00128        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00129 
00130        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00131        I_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
00132 
00133        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(objectPtr);
00134 
00135        int count = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00136        objectPtr->Clear();
00137 
00138        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00139               double x = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_X)->text().toDouble();
00140               double y = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_Y)->text().toDouble();
00141 
00142               objectPtr->InsertNode(i2d::CVector2d(x, y));
00143        }
00144 }

00156 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00157 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnInsertNode()
00158 {
00159        iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00160 
00161        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00162        if (row < 0){
00163               row = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00164 
00165               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(row + 1);
00166        }
00167        else{
00168               NodeParamsTable->insertRow(row);
00169        }
00170 
00171        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_X, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00172        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_Y, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00173        NodeParamsTable->setCurrentCell(row, 0);
00174 
00175        DoUpdateModel();
00176 }

00179 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00180 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnCopyData()
00181 {
00182        PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
00183        if (objectPtr == NULL){
00184               return;
00185        }
00186 
00187        iser::CMemoryWriteArchive archive;
00188 
00189        if (objectPtr->Serialize(archive)){
00190               QByteArray data((const char*)archive.GetBuffer(), archive.GetBufferSize());
00191 
00192               QMimeData* dataPtr = new QMimeData();
00193               dataPtr->setData(typeid(PolygonBasedModel).name(), data);
00194 
00195               QApplication::clipboard()->setMimeData(dataPtr);
00196        }
00197 }

00200 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00201 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnPasteData()
00202 {
00203        PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
00204        if (objectPtr == NULL){
00205               return;
00206        }
00207 
00208        const QMimeData* dataPtr = QApplication::clipboard()->mimeData();
00209        if (dataPtr != NULL){
00210               if (dataPtr->hasFormat(typeid(PolygonBasedModel).name())){
00211                      QByteArray data(dataPtr->data(typeid(PolygonBasedModel).name()));
00212 
00213                      iser::CMemoryReadArchive archive(data.data(), data.size());
00214 
00215                      objectPtr->Serialize(archive);
00216               }
00217        }
00218 }

00221 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00222 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnRemoveNode()
00223 {
00224        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00225        if (row >= 0){
00226               iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00227 
00228               NodeParamsTable->removeRow(row);
00229 
00230               DoUpdateModel();
00231        }
00232 }

00248 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00249 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnGuiModelDetached()

00251        updateClosedLineCheckBox(false, true);

00259 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00260 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateGui(int /*updateFlags*/)
00261 {
00262        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00263 
00264        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00265        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00266               NodeParamsTable->clearContents();
00267 
00268               int count = objectPtr->GetNodesCount();
00269               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(count);
00270 
00271               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00272                      i2d::CVector2d coord = objectPtr->GetNode(i);
00273                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetX())));
00274                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetY())));
00275               }
00276        }
00277 }

00283 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnGuiCreated()
00284 {
00285        BaseClass::OnGuiCreated();
00286 
00287        NodeParamsTable->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Stretch);
00288 
00289        CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate* columnDelegate = new CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate();
00290        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(0, columnDelegate);
00291        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(1, columnDelegate);
00292 
00293        updateClosedLineCheckBox(false, false);
00294 }

00296 
00297 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00298 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::updateClosedLineCheckBox(bool forceEnabled, bool forceHidden)
00299 {
00300        CloseLineCheckBox->setHidden(true);
00301        CloseLineCheckBox->setDisabled(true);
00302 
00303        i2d::CPolyline* polylinePtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolyline*>(GetModelPtr());
00304        if (!forceHidden && polylinePtr != NULL){
00305               CloseLineCheckBox->setChecked(polylinePtr->IsClosed());
00306               CloseLineCheckBox->setHidden(false);
00307               CloseLineCheckBox->setEnabled(forceEnabled || !polylinePtr->IsClosed());
00308        }
00309 }
